product_name: SkirtSports Runners Dream Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Ready to go the distance with you, the smooth, breathable fabric of the SkirtSports Runners Dream top keeps you comfortable even on your longest runs. Lightweight, breathable polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly for comfort even after you start to sweat. Mesh torso and back panels promote ventilation and help regulate your body temperature. Extra long sleeves ensure full wrist coverage; thumbholes keep sleeves in place while running. Skirt Sports Runners Dream top features a droptail hem for extra coverage in the back. Closeout.
short_description: Ready to go the distance with you, the smooth, breathable fabric of the SkirtSports Runners Dream top keeps you comfortable even on your longest runs.
